subject: Baseball
Coaches and Managers
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: The Philadelphia Phillies re-signed their entire coaching staff through 2008, four days after Manager Charlie Manuel got a contract extension. The bench coach Jimy Williams, the pitching coach Rich Dubee, the hitting coach Milt Thompson, the first-base coach Davey Lopes, the third-base coach Steve Smith, the bullpen coach Ramon Henderson and the catching instructor Mick Billmeyer each had his contract renewed yesterday. The National League East champion Phillies finished a game ahead of the Mets to end a 14-year postseason drought, but they were swept by Colorado in the playoffs.
